overview: David Matthews is the Chief Information Officer at Lamar Strategies LLC, a New York consulting company specializing in the improvement of decision making critical to effective implementation of technology products in corporate, education and defense industry business sectors. Lamar Strategies LLC is an experienced group of professionals that joined in 2007 to form a dymanic collaborative consulting firm. Mr. Matthews is responsible for the design and implementation of the analytical support algorithms critical to decision making in the firm’s collaborative consulting projects. He possesses advanced degrees in Computer Science and Accounting which provide the logical platform for building Lamar Strategies’ algebraic solutions that assist educational clients in eliminating costly parallel processes which traditionally negative impact institutional decision making.
